TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l z t ɛ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ z h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s s p uː ŋ z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k n eɪ k æ n ɐ b iː t ɔːɹ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ʌ n s t eɪ æ n d ɐ t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
